name: Frndzk Easy Mobile Theme Switcher with Theme pack
author: Bitto Kazi

sections.description:
Frndzk Mobile Theme Switcher and Theme Pack plugin automatically detects mobile device and shows mobile copatiable theme. It also detects desktop browser and shows main theme. No setup or configuration needed. Even you dont have to search for mobile themes. Frndzk mobile Theme Switcher comes with most lightweight mobile theme pack. Just install and your website will be mobilized demo plugin developed by bitto kazi

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘frndzk-easy-mobile-theme-switcher-with-theme-pack.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory and extract the zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

for questions please write here
